verbs.description: Pres . Donald Trump ( Screenshot ) CNN Video Producer Greg Hughes [V: was] mocked , rebuked and corrected by White House Press Sec . Sarah Sanders Saturday for his false claim about President Donald Trump ’s participation at the G7 summit .
